terramath.worldgen.formula: Math function for the world generator
terramath.worldgen.formula.hint: Leave blank for a default generation
terramath.formula.error.no_variables: Formula must use at least one variable (x or z)
terramath.formula.error.function_parenth: Invalid function usage: %s must be followed by parentheses
terramath.formula.error.three_arguments: %s function requires exactly three arguments, separated by comma
terramath.formula.error.two_arguments: %s function requires exactly two arguments, separated by comma
terramath.formula.error.operator_start_e: Formula cannot start with */ or end with an operator
